SEARCH
Package kp.company.endpoints

Class DepartmentEndpointsTests

java.lang.Object
kp.company.endpoints.DepartmentEndpointsTests
@SpringBootTest @AutoConfigureMockMvc class DepartmentEndpointsTests extends Object
The tests for the Department with server-side support using MockMvc.
The endpoints were generated by Spring Data from the repositories.
